Label.en: Before he died, he was determined to make a name for himself and cement his legacy
Label.fr: En plus de son go√ªt pour l'aventure, Giacomo devenait facilement ami avec d'autres animaux...
Label.es: Adem√°s de su amor por la aventura, Giacomo se hac√≠a amigos facilmente con los otros animales...

Label.en: So how better to do that than build one of the biggest and most extravagant monuments the world had ever seen?
Label.fr: En plus de son go√ªt pour l'aventure, Giacomo devenait facilement ami avec d'autres animaux...
Label.es: Adem√°s de su amor por la aventura, Giacomo se hac√≠a amigos facilmente con los otros animales...

Label.fr: En plus de son go√ªt pour l'aventure, Giacomo devenait facilement ami avec d'autres animaux...
Label.es: Adem√°s de su amor por la aventura, Giacomo se hac√≠a amigos facilmente con los otros animales...

Label.en: So he hired four famous sculptors to do one side each of the monument!

Label.en: Many authors, such as Pliny the Elder, wrote about it, and it was included in the Seven Ancient Wonders of the World
